ygData.subject: Re: From eq.stratics.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Just another thought and has NO proof or basis. . but with all the stuff bout mino caves. . . its not on the hero is it? Just a thought . . . . Nice of em to
ygData.messageBody:
Just another thought and has NO proof or basis. . but with all the stuff
bout mino caves. . . its not on the hero is it?

Just a thought . . . .

Nice of em to add stuff to blacksmithing skill in this patch. . seems us
tinkerers are left out on a limb =(

Wibblers - 15th Season Necromancer
----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Franzen <efranzen@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 3:16 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] From eq.stratics.com


> From: "Eric Franzen" <efranzen@...>
>
> I thought I would let you know that after reading the following post
> yesterday, I decided to go hunt Meldrath. Well, after 7 hours, with a
spawn
> rate of 5 minutes, I didn't see the third book. I can safely assume that
if
> you kill Meldrath 84 times and you don't get the book that it doesn't
exist.
> Oh well. It was the best rumor I had heard in awhile. Now if I can just
> get the friends that helped me to stop laughing at me :)
>
> Wandatin Dai'Noga
> 39th level Enchanter on Karana
> >
> > jbuckingham@... wrote:
> >
> > > Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the
> recipes.
> > >
> > >
> > > "
> > >
> > > Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components
for
> the new
> > > ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
> > > So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become
> apparent,
> > > as all those rangers go gunning for him :)
> >
> > --Eron
> > aeron@...
>
> >
